title: 820-3787 distorted image
message:
Have a 820-3787 that has distorted looking apple logo when loading and once loaded login screen only shows couple seconds as seen in pictures but the going to just backlight only shortly after.

works fine on external. Test known good lcd was used and still same issue.

what to check first?

title: 820-3787 distorted image
message: Just curious does it look like it?s been previously repaired? I had one just like that where the CPU died from doingthe FDMF fix...

title: 820-3787 distorted image
message: I doubt to be dead CPU, if gets good external video...

title: 820-3787 distorted image
message: If it's the one I had, I would bet on it. If not, then yeah could be something else I suppose.

title: 820-3787 distorted image
message:
Reflowing U9650 didn't make a difference.

Yes, unfortunately  this board looks like its been worked on before.

Serial number C0242220072FP541M

title: 820-3787 distorted image
message: Yep that?s junk that?s the one I had in for ?graphics shutdowns?. Has a bad CPU already have replaced all the FDMF6708s made no difference. Time to tell the store that sent it not to send you junk
